DOC.brief_summary: This observational study , conduct Kenya Society Hematology Oncology , develop Breast Cancer Care Registry ( BRECC ) Kenya . Data demographic , clinical pathological characteristic , treatment clinical outcome collect newly diagnose breast cancer patient . Breast cancer patient recruit registry cohort follow period less five year .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study Register Incidence Breast Cancer Current Clinical Care Patterns Kenya
DOC.criteria: Histologically cytologically confirm breast cancer No previous interventional therapy breast cancer Ability provide write informed consent per GCP local regulation Participation clinical study diagnosis treatment protocol state prior enrolment Inability ass follow patient outcome , example quality life due psychiatric illness WHO/ECOG performance status IV worse
